about_the_game:
※The personal independent parkour game "Hustle Game V1" is a game that combines parkour and combat elements. It is based on the theme of the Time Administration. Players will play a member of a special task force, traveling through various time and space scenes, executing mission and protect the stability of the timeline. Multiple scenes (ancient style, cyber, fantasy, ink painting) + multiple mechanisms (parkour, racing, survival, combat)

※Parkour Challenge: Launch parkour challenges in time and space scenes of different styles such as Chinese style, cyberpunk, fantasy, etc. Players need to run, jump, roll in high-rise buildings, ancient city streets, future technology cities and other scenes, avoid obstacles and enemy pursuits, and reach the end as quickly as possible.

※Combat missions: During the parkour process, players will encounter various enemies, including invaders from other time and space, evil forces that destroy the timeline, etc. Players can perform combat actions such as close combat and long-range attacks to engage in fierce battles with enemies and protect the safety of mission targets.

※Diverse time and space scenes: The game has rich and colorful time and space scenes. Players can freely travel through scenes such as ancient China, future technology cities, and the fantasy world of myths and legends, and experience different cultural atmospheres and beautiful scene designs; personalized characters Customization: Players can customize the character's appearance and equipment to create their own agent image, choose weapons and skills that suit their own style, and improve their combat capabilities.

name: HustleGame

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: "Xuyu HustleGame V1" is a game that combines parkour and combat. By blending parkour and combat elements, a game experience full of excitement and challenges is created, allowing players to experience endless fun and adventure on their journey to protect the timeline.
